response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe is a perfect match for your needs and expectations. Given its value and quality, I understand its worth to you is $10,000. Considering the exceptional features and benefits it provides, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $9,500. This offer is designed to ensure you receive the best possible value while allowing us to maintain a competitive edge in the market. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this special offer.", "product_price": 9500}
